snippet: Amid the government shutdown, New York State will pay National Park Service personnel to reopen the popular attraction this weekend.
abstract: New York State and federal officials reach agreement to reopen the Statue of Liberty amid the government shutdown; state will pay $61,600 a day for National Park Service personnel to reopen the popular destination.
lead_paragraph: Amid the government shutdown, New York State will pay National Park Service personnel to reopen the popular attraction this weekend.

headline.main: Deal Will Reopen Statue of Liberty
headline.print_headline: Deal Will Reopen Statue of Liberty
